mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_result.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM ( SELECT n.notice_Idx AS noticeIdx, n.notice_Title AS noticeTitle, n.notice_Sub AS noticeSub, n.notice_Date AS noticeDate, n.notice_Modify AS noticeModify, a.user_name AS writeName FROM NOTICE_TABLE n JOIN USER_TABLE a ON n.user_idx = a.user_idx ORDER BY n.notice_Date DESC ) inner_result WHERE ROWNUM <= #{offset} + #{size} ) WHERE rnum > #{offset}

SELECT N.NOTICE_IDX, N.NOTICE_TITLE, N.NOTICE_SUB, N.NOTICE_DATE, N.NOTICE_MODIFY, N.USER_IDX, U.USER_NAME AS write_Name FROM NOTICE_TABLE N LEFT JOIN USER_TABLE U ON N.USER_IDX = U.USER_IDX WHERE N.NOTICE_IDX = #{noticeIdx}
SELECT * FROM NOTICE_TABLE WHERE IS_POPUP = 'Y' AND POPUP_START_DATE < SYSDATE AND POPUP_END_DATE >= SYSDATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE_TABLE (NOTICE_IDX, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_SUB, USER_IDX, NOTICE_DATE) VALUES (NOTICE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeSub}, #{userIdx}, SYSDATE)
